title: Disney Plus Schedule April 7 – April 13 2025: New TV Shows & Movies Being Added
description: Disney Plus’ new TV and movie release schedule for April 7 – April 13, 2025, includes David Blaine Do Not Attempt’s new episodes, Daredevil: Born Again’s penultimate episode, Marvel’s Spidey and his Amazing Friends Season 3, and Doctor Who Season 2. On April 7, David Blaine Do Not Attempt’s new episodes drop on the streaming […] The post Disney Plus Schedule April 7 – April 13 2025: New TV Shows & Movies Being Added appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.

excerpt: Are you growing curious about the Disney Plus schedule from April 7 to April 13, 2025. Here is a list of releases.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Disney Plus’ new TV and movie release schedule for April 7 – April 13, 2025, includes David Blaine Do Not Attempt’s new episodes, Daredevil: Born Again’s penultimate episode, Marvel’s Spidey and his Amazing Friends Season 3, and Doctor Who Season 2. On April 7, David Blaine Do Not Attempt’s new episodes drop on the streaming platform. The documentary series showcases host David Blaine meeting talented personalities who do tricks that are no less than magic. Thus, Blaine takes viewers on an extraordinary journey involving people’s jaw-dropping skills and various fascinating cultures. Further, Daredevil: Born Again’s penultimate episode releases on Disney Plus this week. The previous episode showcases Angela telling the police that Daredevil rescued her and guides them to Muse’s hideout. Further, Fisk gets angry after learning about the superhero’s return. Also coming out on Disney Plus is Marvel’s Spidey and His Amazing Friends Season 3. The animated series showcases Peter Parker coming together with other Marvel superheroes to face off against mutual enemies. They believe fighting together as a team can make things easier for everyone. Additionally, Doctor Who Season 2 premieres on the streaming platform on April 12. Season 2 showcases the doctor’s journey to bring Belinda Chandra back to earth. However, a mysterious power becomes a roadblock to their goals. New Disney Plus releases for April 7 – April 13 2025 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Disney Plus from April 7 to April 13 2025 April 7 David Blaine Do Not Attempt – Two New Episodes April 8 Marvel Television’s Daredevil: Born Again – Penultimate Episode at 6 pm PT April 9 Marvel’s Spidey and His Amazing Friends (S3, 4 episodes) April 11 The Abyss 4K Pets April 12 Titanic: The Digital Resurrection To Catch a Smuggler (S8, 8 episodes) Doctor Who (Season 2) – Premiere For more Disney Plus content, check out the trailer for Phineas and Ferb Season 5. Also, here is the trailer for Andor Season 2.
html:
Disney Plus’ new TV and movie release schedule for April 7 – April 13, 2025, includes David Blaine Do Not Attempt’s new episodes, Daredevil: Born Again’s penultimate episode, Marvel’s Spidey and his Amazing Friends Season 3, and Doctor Who Season 2.

On April 7, David Blaine Do Not Attempt’s new episodes drop on the streaming platform. The documentary series showcases host David Blaine meeting talented personalities who do tricks that are no less than magic. Thus, Blaine takes viewers on an extraordinary journey involving people’s jaw-dropping skills and various fascinating cultures.

Further, Daredevil: Born Again’s penultimate episode releases on Disney Plus this week. The previous episode showcases Angela telling the police that Daredevil rescued her and guides them to Muse’s hideout. Further, Fisk gets angry after learning about the superhero’s return.

Also coming out on Disney Plus is Marvel’s Spidey and His Amazing Friends Season 3. The animated series showcases Peter Parker coming together with other Marvel superheroes to face off against mutual enemies. They believe fighting together as a team can make things easier for everyone.

Additionally, Doctor Who Season 2 premieres on the streaming platform on April 12. Season 2 showcases the doctor’s journey to bring Belinda Chandra back to earth. However, a mysterious power becomes a roadblock to their goals.

New Disney Plus releases for April 7 – April 13 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Disney Plus from April 7 to April 13 2025

April 7

  • David Blaine Do Not Attempt – Two New Episodes

April 8

  • Marvel Television’s Daredevil: Born Again – Penultimate Episode at 6 pm PT

April 9

  • Marvel’s Spidey and His Amazing Friends (S3, 4 episodes)

April 11

  • The Abyss 4K
  • Pets

April 12

  • Titanic: The Digital Resurrection
  • To Catch a Smuggler (S8, 8 episodes)
  • Doctor Who (Season 2) – Premiere

For more Disney Plus content, check out the trailer for Phineas and Ferb Season 5. Also, here is the trailer for Andor Season 2.
